message: Eg sfgate, sfist (not a huge fan of the -ist sites though). Decent non-firehose twitter feeds also welcome.

I've got baycitizen.org in my feed reader. You might find something else interesting in this gigantic list: http://www.reddit.com/r/sanfrancisco/comments/eyqkd/i_thought_id_compile_a_large_list_of_san/
